member.name: M:Agilent.OpenLab.Framework.DataAccess.AcamlInfrastructure.Interfaces.IAcamlReader.CreatePrefetchLock
member.summary: Create a disposable lock object. The call will lock the Injection-ACAML prefetch cache. A dispose of the returned object will unlock the cache. This must be done, after all Injection-ACAMLs are prefetched.
member.remarks: The same behaviour can be reached by callling the method pair /.

member.name: M:Agilent.OpenLab.Framework.DataAccess.AcamlInfrastructure.Interfaces.IAcamlReader.PrefetchInjectionAcaml(Agilent.OpenLab.Framework.DataAccess.AcamlInfrastructure.Interfaces.IInjectionAcamlReference,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Prefetch Injection-ACAML part into internal cache.
member.remarks: The merge method must be called afterwards, to append the Injection-ACAMLs to the current ACAML document.

member.name: M:Agilent.OpenLab.Framework.DataAccess.AcamlInfrastructure.Interfaces.IAcamlReader.BeginInjectionAcamlPrefetching
member.summary: Enable Injection-ACAML prefetch locking. Lock the internal Injection-ACAML cache, so that merge of the Injection-ACAML parts will be blocked.
member.remarks: A Sequence-ACAML must be loaded, otherwise an exception will be thrown. Ensure, that the method is called, when all Injection-ACAML parts where prefetched. Otherwise each call of the merge method will be blocked.
member.exception: will be thown, if no Sequence-ACAML is loaded.

member.name: M:Agilent.OpenLab.Framework.DataAccess.AcamlInfrastructure.Interfaces.IAcamlReader.EndInjectionAcamlPrefetching
member.summary: Disable Injection-ACAML prefetch locking. Unlock Injection-ACAML cache, to unlock merge of the Injection-ACAML parts.
member.remarks: Must be called after prefetch of all Injection-ACAML parts. Otherwise each call of the merge method will be blocked.

member.name: P:Agilent.OpenLab.Framework.DataAccess.AcamlInfrastructure.Interfaces.IAcamlReader.IsPrefetchLockEnabled
member.summary: Return true, if the Injection-ACAML prefetch locking is enabled.

member.name: M:Agilent.OpenLab.Framework.DataAccess.AcamlInfrastructure.Interfaces.IAcamlReader.MergeInjectionAcamls(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Merge prefetched Injection-ACAML parts into current Sequence-ACAML. A merge of a specified set of Injection-ACAMLs is optional possible.
member.param: Enumeration of InjectionMeasData-IDs, for which injections will be merged (optional).
member.remarks: The Injections-ACAML parts must be prefechted into the internal cache. The merge operation will required no storage access.
member.exception: will be thown, if merge operation failed.

member.name: M:Agilent.OpenLab.Framework.DataAccess.AcamlInfrastructure.Interfaces.IAcamlReaderWriter.LoadAcamlMetadata(Agilent.OpenLab.Framework.Infrastructure.Storage.Interfaces.IStorageProvider,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets injection meta data items of specified ACAML file from work area.
member.param: OPTIONAL: Value indicating whether the injection meta data is created if missing. Default is true .
member.remarks: If is set to false or if the specified ACAML file contains injection meta data, only the file's meta data section is queried. The remaining ACAML file is not loaded into in-memory object model. However, if is set to true and the specified ACAML file has no meta data, the ACAML file is completely loaded into memory, the meta data information is gathered and stored in the meta data section, and finally the ACAML document including the meta data is saved back to disk.

member.summary: Performs document-wide full text search and returns IDs of injections that contain specified keywords. Search is based on all injection-related string properties in ACAML document.
member.param: List of keywords to search for.
member.remarks: Injections are identified via fuzzy match, i.e. values of string properties must only contain specified keywords. All specified keywords are combined using logical AND.
